A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Besides a few cool actions scenes and the scenes between Rey and Kylo\, this film is NOT Star Wars. Not only does it have the most boring plot with the most unimportant sideplots\, the film is almost entirely filler with scenes taken out straight from rotj and esb. Horrible\, can not believe the films stooped even lower to what The Force Awakens brought.
